mapper.select: SELECT MT_SHCODE AS SHCODE, SIA_ABCODE AS ABCODE, MT_TLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER, TL_COMMENT AS TLCOMMENT, MT_DETAIL AS MTDETAIL FROM MT INNER JOIN TL ON MT.MT_TLNUMBER = TL.TL_NUMBER INNER JOIN SIA ON MT.MT_SHCODE = SIA.SIA_SHCODE WHERE SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}

SELECT MT_SHCODE AS SHCODE, SIA_ABCODE AS ABCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, MT_TLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER, TL_COMMENT AS TLCOMMENT, MT_DETAIL AS MTDETAIL
